bug.author: Herklos
bug.summary: [Bug][EvaluatorThread] Data update takes on more sec after each refresh_data
bug.description: The Data update takes on more sec after each refresh_data of TimeFrameUpdateDataThread see log : <denchmark-code>2018-04-05 19:26:46,013 TA THREAD - BTCUSDT - BinanceExchange - TimeFrames.ONE_MINUTE INFO Notified by TimeFrameUpdateDataThread 2018-04-05 19:27:47,079 TA THREAD - BTCUSDT - BinanceExchange - TimeFrames.ONE_MINUTE INFO Notified by TimeFrameUpdateDataThread 2018-04-05 19:28:48,505 TA THREAD - BTCUSDT - BinanceExchange - TimeFrames.ONE_MINUTE INFO Notified by TimeFrameUpdateDataThread 2018-04-05 19:29:49,621 TA THREAD - BTCUSDT - BinanceExchange - TimeFrames.ONE_MINUTE INFO Notified by TimeFrameUpdateDataThread 2018-04-05 19:30:51,038 TA THREAD - BTCUSDT - BinanceExchange - TimeFrames.ONE_MINUTE INFO Notified by TimeFrameUpdateDataThread </denchmark-code>
